name: ratbag
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
UK an unpleasant person; sometimes used humorously about someone you like: She's nothing more than a thieving ratbag!humorous "I won a competition." "You lucky ratbag! What did you win?"
Australian English someone who causes trouble or does things that you disapprove of: My nephew's a real ratbag.
More examplesFewer examplesThe bloke who did it has got to go down as one of the ratbags of the year."I might just do that, you old ratbag," he hooted.Stop being a ratbag and actually think about it.Conservatives like myself, we're called right-wing ratbags by the left.
